Oh and yeah I forgot after the raws https://nhentai.net/g/260079/ there is also ch 5 https://nhentai.net/g/298555/ and ch 6 https://nhentai.net/g/298729/ in them seemingly the rapist has been stalking the boss and wife and even calls the husband to hint at the wife cheating on him. He also sends the husband a picture of the boss and wife having dinner together when he's on a buisness trip and she said she was home alone, which makes him suspect her but he still shrugs it of and trusts her.

Though at the same time you gotta wonder how the husband isn't suspecting anything since for instance in https://nhentai.net/g/304140/ the wife goes over to give the boss some of their dinner, which shouldn't take longer then a few mins, but then she goes missing for hours...yeah nothing sus about that at all.

@FresshLikeLettuce Dude even worse is the fact that the guy who's making him work overtime and doing trips is the dude here who is banging the wife since the dude banging the wife is the husbands boss. Having read all the chapters I think it's pretty heavily hinted at that the boss is abusing his position to force the husband to work so he can sleep with his wife. Even when the husband is home or free he forces the wife to stay with him instead and sleep with him.

After this one which is ch 7 in the story, then ch 8 https://nhentai.net/g/304140/, ch 9 https://nhentai.net/g/346425/ and lastly ch 10 https://nhentai.net/g/344017/ all of these have been translated though the stuff from before this is still raw https://nhentai.net/g/260079/. I read in a comment on another site that this will probably never be finished since the hentai author started a buisness and kinda put the hentai part on hold for a long time. He did post a preview for continuing this story on twitter but eventually took it down on his own.
